This game is OK. Nothing more I mean the idea is very original and solid. I would give it an overall 6/10.
Pros:
-The gameplay style is awesome, combining different elements is very entertaining. It's definitely a fresh idea.
-Very cool weapons that give you different abilities.
Cons: (more disadvantages than advantages, sadly)
-Has tons of bugs.
-Not enough saving points is very fucking frustrating.
-Frost+Arcane+Lightning+right click is overpowered and can kill anything with no problem. That kind of imbalances the whole gameplay totally. Because of this there is no need for weapons at all.
-The spells you obtain throughout the game cannot be used. Bugged or what? Idk. 

Well it's definitely not worth the money, but it is fun if you wanna burn some time.

Well yeah, the game has some issues... But there is one big difference between this here pirated one and if you but it on steam. PATCHES. You see andrew: When you own the game through steam, patches download automatically and it seems that the developers are well aware of the early problems. There are more savepoints and the spell combos work as they should... maybe they even f*cked it up so that us pirates would have a lousy experience. Who knows? Anyhoo... loved the game. Downloaded it, played it for 10 minutes and then bought it.

3) Once installed, update the game with this http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6127772/Magicka.Update.1-SKIDROW.

4) Use the crack provided with the update instead of the one with the main folder.

5) Experience the game, then buy it, it's totally worth the measly â‚¬10 to play online :).

You CAN play this game online, I already tried it today with a friend, here are the instructions. The one I write here is shorter, while the one in the link includes links and etc., just remove the + (it includes a link to the Update 7 download).

1) Installed the SKIDROW version. DON'T install the cracked content

2) Immediately installed SKIDROWâ€™s update 7, DON'T install the crack files for the update either.

3) Made a steam_appid.txt file with the demoâ€™s app id (73050) and placed it in the root of the Magicka install folder.

4) Lauched the game with legit steam running in the background

(Note that it must say that youâ€™re playing the Magicka demo and anyone else that tries to join the game)

5) Play the game.

For anyone having problems starting the game(crashes before it even opens) right click the exe. file and then properties. 

Then on compatibilities, run it as Windows XP (SP3)

Worked for me after that, also running the game as administrator might work.

I downloaded, downloaded the three extra programs, took the files from the SKIDROW folder and pasted/overwrote the files in the magicka main program folder. It told me the program has stopped working, and do I want to send an error report. I have windows xp. I am already an administrator, so I can't change that. I tried running it with less options, still nothing. I dunno why it's not working, but it seems to be happening to a lot of people, so i think it's something in the program.

To all of you having trouble. During the install you will have to select the 3 extra components and install them, two will fail (dx and the other probably not even included in the torrent) and the other will work.

Then it will probably still give an error, try right-click run as administrator (worked for me), righ-click - properties - compatibility - run as....windows xp sp1/2/3.

Hope that helps.

@killswitch. If you are operating with windows xp, you don't have the option to run in compatibility mode with windows xp. You must be running a newer version of windows, because you are able to select windows xp. For me, the choices are win95, 98, ME/2000, and WinNT. Also, I don't know what people mean when they say run as administrator. I am already an admin on my computer, so that shouldn't have posed a problem.

Here is how to fix the "stopped working" issue.

First, turn off windows UAC (User account control).
To make it, open your control panel, type in UAC on the search box and then open it.
If you are using Vista, uncheck the box.
If you are using Seven, drag the control all the way down.
Click ok.
Reboot the computer.

Now, if you already install magicka, uninstall it, both the update and the game itself.

Run the Game instalation.
When finished, mark the two last boxes (Framework 3.5 and XNA).

Crack it.

Enjoy =D

After an entire morning of stuffing around with this I finally got it to run in Windows 7 64 bit


Instructions:
BEFORE INSTALLING 
Press start and search UAC and click 'Change user account control settings" 
Slide the bar all the way to the bottom and press OK
Restart your computer 

INSTALLATION
Download the following link and install the game using deamon tools (or your proffered software) to mount the image.
http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/6127579/Magicka-SKIDROW.6127579.TPB.torrent
Install the game and once at the finish screen of the install, click each tick box and install each of the components.
Download the following link and install the exe file. 
http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/6318771/Magicka.Update.19.and.20.incl.Vietnam.DLC-SKIDROW.6318771.TPB.torrent
Open the install folder (%systemdrive%:\Program Files (x86)\Paradox Interactive\Magicka OR %systemdrive%:\Program Files\Paradox Interactive\Magicka)
Open the Update 19 and 20 folder and copy the CONTENTS (not the folder) into the install folder previously mentioned
Once complete, run steam and then double click the Magicka shortcut on your desktop

IF IT STILL DOESN'T WORK 
If it still doesn't run, right click the Magicka shortcut on the desktop and choose properties 
Choose the compatibility tab and tick "Run the program as an administrator" AND "Run this program in compatibility for:" (select "Windows XP Service pack 3")

Protips for Win7 users getting xna errors, access level errors, etc.:

1. Start> Search> "UAC"> Never Notify
2. Run setup as administrator
3. Click all three checkboxes at the end of install
4. Copy over skidrow files
5. Right click Magicka app> properties> compatibility>[x] compaibility mode, win xp sp3 & [x] run as administrator

To those people that are getting errors about XNA Texture something, if you are using intel chipset and it cannot be solved. Or if you have a nVidia video card but still doesn't work go to nVidia control panel --> Manage 3d settings --> Global Settings Tab --> set Preferred grapchics processor to High-performance NVIDIA processor instead of auto select then apply.
